title: Yu-Hsuan (Emilie) Cheng
text:
Welcome!
Hello! Iâ€™m Yu-Hsuan (Emilie) Cheng, a Masterâ€™s student in Epidemiology at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health.
I am passionate about clinical trials, evidence synthesis, and advancing healthcare through rigorous research.
With a background in veterinary medicine and public health, I bring a unique interdisciplinary perspective to my work in pharmacoepidemiology and infectious disease research.
Currently, I am also part of the Certificate Program in Pharmacoepidemiology and Drug Safety, and my research focuses include oncology, healthcare-associated infections, and digital health interventions to improve patient care.
Feel free to explore my site to learn more about my experiences, research, and interests!
